notes.3.11.1: Enjoy new vibration patterns, improved Pebble Health sleep tracking, and timeline snooze in Time-series watches. Fixed bugs and improved performance for all models. Learn more at blog.getpebble.com.
notes.3.112-health10: Sleep algorithm improvements, a couple new views for the Health app, summary activity pin in the timeline.
notes.3.13.1-rbl: Hey Rebbles! Does anybody really know what time it is? This update picks up the latest time zone updates from the last decade.
notes.3.13.2-rbl: Hello again, Rebbles! Time is like a liquid in our hands. This update fixes daylight savings time in Ireland (oops!).
notes.4.3: Bugs? Squashed a bunch. Stability improvements for all watches? Of course. See heart rate zones with compatible 2-Series watches. Unlock Kickstart, a brand new watchface. Update your watch and phone app to 4.3 and learn more at blog.getpebble.com.
notes.4.4.0-rbl: Hey Rebbles! This update fixes dictation with iOS on the Pebble 2 and Pebble Time Round, and improves iOS dictation reliability on all other watches. Dictation still requires a subscription: auth.rebble.io
notes.4.4.1-rbl: Hey Rebbles! Does anybody really know what time it is? This update picks up the latest time zone updates from the last decade.
notes.4.4.2-rbl: Hello again, Rebbles! Time is like a liquid in our hands. This update fixes daylight savings time in Ireland (oops!).
notes.3.13.3-rbl: Sigh. It's me again, Rebbles. I think I definitely got the time zone database right this time, in both Ireland and South America.
notes.4.4.3-rbl: Sigh. It's me again, Rebbles. I think I definitely got the time zone database right this time, in both Ireland and South America.
